meanings.sent1: The nonguests were not invited to the party.
meanings.sent2: The hotel has a separate entrance for nonguests to use.
meanings.sent3: The nonguests accidentally walked into the wrong event.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with nonguests, like uninvited flowers in a field.
meanings.sent5: The nonguests stood out in the crowd with their casual attire.

meanings.definition: Those who are not staying at a particular place as guests.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had a section reserved for nonguests.
meanings.sent2: The security guard directed the nonguests to the visitor parking lot.
meanings.sent3: The nonguests wandered around the hotel lobby, looking lost.
meanings.sent4: The conference room was bustling with nonguests, like bees outside a hive.
meanings.sent5: The nonguests lingered near the entrance, unsure of where to go next.
